title: Please teach me!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Nozomi-san, there’s something I would like to ask!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>What’s the matter? You can ask me anything<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Mari-san told me that the “Washi Washi” game you played with her was very interesting, Nozomi-san. So I want you to teach me too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, that thing? Fufu, alright, I’ll teach you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Thank you very much! Ehehe, I heard that you’re a “Washi Washi” specialist, so I’m really happy that you’re teaching me, Nozomi-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Y-, yeah…. It’s not that big of a deal though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I’m so excited!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Wa-, Washi Washi~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>? You’re just patting my head….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Umm, this is the trial version of “Washi Washi”. Let’s take it one step at a time, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay, I understand! I’ll do my best to remember it! I can’t wait to play “Washi Washi” with everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
